s0202: Emperor Jing watched and laughed saying: 'This is not enough for sir?'
s0203: Marquis Tiao removed his cap and apologized.
s0204: The emperor rose, Marquis Tiao thus hurried out.
s0205: Emperor Jing followed with his eyes, said: 'This discontented one is not a minister for a young lord!'
s0207: After not long, Marquis Tiao's son for father bought from the artisan office Shangfang five hundred suits of armor and shields that could be used for burial.
s0208: Took laborers to work them hard, did not give money.
s0209: The laborers knew they were illicitly buying government equipment, angered and reported the irregularity, accusing the son, the matter implicated and defiled Marquis Tiao.
s0210: The memorial having reached the emperor, sent down officials.
s0211: The officials interrogated Marquis Tiao according to the records, Marquis Tiao did not answer.
s0212: Emperor Jing cursed saying: 'I will not employ you.'
s0213: Summoned to the Chamberlain for Law Enforcement.
s0214: The Chamberlain for Law Enforcement interrogated saying: 'Marquis wishes to rebel?'
s0215: Yafu said: 'What your servant bought were burial items, why speak of rebellion?'
s0216: The officials said: 'Even if marquis does not rebel on the earth, he wishes to rebel under the earth.'
s0217: The officials pressed him increasingly urgently.
s0218: Initially when officials arrested Marquis Tiao, Marquis Tiao wished to commit suicide, his wife stopped him, because of this could not die, thus entered the Chamberlain for Law Enforcement.
s0219: Thus did not eat for five days, vomited blood and died.
s0221: Cut off for one year, Emperor Jing then re-enfeoffed Marquis Jiang Bo's other son Jian as Marquis of Pingqu, continued the Marquis of Jiang's line.
s0222: Nineteen years died, posthumous title Marquis Gong.
s0223: Son Jiande succeeded to the marquisate, thirteen years, served as crown prince tutor.
s0224: Because of unsatisfactory tribute wine, Yuanding year 5, had crime, state abolished.
s0225: Marquis Tiao indeed starved to death.
s0226: After death, Emperor Jing then enfeoffed Wang Xin as Marquis of Gai.
s0227: The Grand Historian says: Marquis Jiang Zhou Bo when beginning as commoner, was a vulgar rustic, ability no more than ordinary.
s0228: When followed Gaozu to settle the realm, in general and chancellor position, the various LÃ¼ wished to make rebellion, Bo rectified the state's difficulties, returned it to correctness.
s0229: Even Yi Yin and Zhou Gong, what could surpass this!
s0230: Yafu's use of troops, held authority and weight, grasped firm blade, Rang Ju what could surpass this!
s0231: Self-sufficient without learning, maintained integrity without yielding, ultimately ended in poverty.
